posts.text: 这是一篇测试blogWelcome to yangzhenning’s Life ：) java123456789101112131415161718192021222324252627282930313233343536373839404142434445464748495051525354555657585960616263646566/* * Copyright (C), 2013-2016, 汇通达网络有限公司 * FileName: LogTrackingInteceptor.java * Author: 杨振宁 * Date: 2016-6-20 下午5:20:10 * Description: //模块目的、功能描述 * History: //修改记录 * <author> <time> <version> <desc> * 修改人姓名 修改时间 版本号 描述 */package com.htd.finance.cfs.inteceptor;import java.util.UUID;import org.aspectj.lang.annotation.After;import org.aspectj.lang.annotation.Aspect;import org.aspectj.lang.annotation.Before;import org.aspectj.lang.annotation.Pointcut;import org.slf4j.MDC;import org.springframework.stereotype.Service;/** * 〈一句话功能简述〉<br> * 数据采集，dubbo方法入口增加日志跟踪唯一代码<br> * * @author 杨振宁 * @see [相关类/方法]（可选） * @since [产品/模块版本] （可选） */@Service("logTrackingInteceptor")@Aspectpublic class LogTrackingInteceptor { private static final String STR_INVOKENO = "invokeNo"; private static final String MIDDLE_LINE = "-"; private static final String BLANK = ""; /** * 定义一个切入点 */ @SuppressWarnings("unused") @Pointcut("execution (* com.htd.finance.cfs..*.facade.impl.*.*(..)))") private void dubboRequestMethod() { } /** * 定义后置通知，执行dubbo方法之前的准备工作 */ @Before("dubboRequestMethod()") public void beforedubboRequest() { // 调用流水号 MDC.put(STR_INVOKENO, UUID.randomUUID().toString().replace(MIDDLE_LINE, BLANK)); } /** * 定义后置通知，执行dubbo方法之后删除废弃的数据 */ @After("dubboRequestMethod()") public void afterdubboRequest() { MDC.remove(STR_INVOKENO); } } javascript12345678910111213141516doCreate : function(url, form, datagrid, title, top, width, height, addButton, reload, maximizable, onSubmitCallback, successCallback, failCallback, onCloseWindow) { $('#' + datagrid).datagrid('uncheckAll').datagrid('unselectAll').datagrid('clearSelections'); var t = top ? top : null; var w = width ? width : 500; var h = height ? height : 'auto'; var tt = title ? title : '添加'; var addB = addButton ? addButton : '增加'; var max = maximizable ? maximizable : false; var d = null; $.finance.divdialog = d = $('<div/>').dialog({ href : contextPath + url, title : tt, top : t, width : w, height : h, modal : true,

posts.title: Hello World
posts.text: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment
